Needed a new keyboard quick.. so I got this one. The keyboard is very small and I have a hard time typing on it. The buttons seem to be a little off from my other ones. Also the mouse is SUPER small. VERY uncomfortable. Lastly, EVERY time I turn on my PC I need to reset the colors from flashing and reset the mouse pointer speed. Bad buy for sure,.

I've had this for over a year now and some of the paint is flaking off of the keys I use the most when gaming (WASD), but otherwise I really enjoy this keyboard for the price point. the light colors are not customizeable as well as higher-end keyboards but there's a pretty decent selection to pick from.

I am disappointed that this keyboard does not have downloadable software, and it does not maintain the light settings. You have to reset the lights after every restart. It has a nice feel, and if these 2 things were fixed, this would be an awesome keyboard/mouse combo.

I really bought this for the backlight feature; it serves this purpose well. The multimedia keys to control media player do not work. The software for the mouse is buggy and is does not come with any instruction manual.

It's a kb & mouse combo for 20 bucks. Far superior to that horrible chicklet thing that Amazon has decided to stick it's label on. Keys are comfortable. Mouse doesn't quite fit my hand, but has the extra buttons on the side. If you're on a budget this is definitely the combo to get. Some of the keyboard labeling makes it look cheap, but it is fairly decent quality. Again kb & mouse combo that's far superior to the amazon essentials for only a couple bucks more.

Just bought this and got it today. It says on page 7 of the manual about downloading software but doesn't give an address or disk on where to download it. I went to their site and the search found NOTHING for Model "S101-3".  I haven't even hooked up the keyboard and mouse combo yet and am feeling a bit taken by this set. And their website is unstable to begin with.

"W" button wouldn't work. RMA requested, but box destroyed so cancelled RMA. Took apart and found a plastic strip glued near the W button.  Took strip out, still not working. Cut plastic strip and put directly over the W button pad...now it works, for now.  Manufacture defect, poor attempt by manufacture to fix known problem...we'll see how long my fix lasts.
Good gaming keyboard. I like the lights. Soft buttons. Smooth touches.I will have the mouse is the OK categorie. Nothing is wrong with it. But I have tried smoother click.

I hate this thing. Not only did it break after two months of light office work but every once in a while it defaults to its original state which is "FLASH EVERY COLOR CONSTANTLY AND ANNOY YOU UNTIL YOU STOP IT".

Nice keybourd and mouse. However in the add for this outfit it says software included , there is no software included and there is no mouse drivers to make all the buttons on the mouse work as they advertise, i also tried to d/l drivers to program the mouse and there where no drivers found that would work with this mouse.But it is a nice outfit
This keyboard and mouse combo is worth every penny. The backlit options are very cool!

I bought this as my beginning gaming keyboard but found many problems in less than an hour. First the keyboard had missing pieces all along the rim. Second the keyboard didn’t let me use the numblock which is very important to controlling brightness and other gaming aspects. And thirdly the light barely lit up the keys. It is still a very fast keyboard but if you bought it RETURN IT!!!

Keyboard worked great for the 1st few months, with no issues. Just recently while playing a game, some of the keys do not function when pressed, while others will keep doing the command even when not pressed. This keyboard has not been used that frequently and is in great shape. Very disappointing.

After growing tired of my wireless mouse/keyboard (connection issues) I looked for a wired keyboard/mouse combo.  The Red Dragon series is a solid entry.  While not comparable to some keyboards with all the extra bells and whistles, this is a solid, well made system.  The keys are comfortable with that satisfying "clack" (yes I'm old school), and the mouse is comfortable, easy to use, with several options.  Overall, a great set to have on your desk.

It's a good keyboard and mouse for its price  you'll have to adjust the cursor speed but it's pretty good. It doesn't have a thousand buttons on the mouse that you wont use cause your game doesn't have a bunch of random controls unless your playing arma or something crazy like expensive ones do.

Not sure about the quality of the keyboard and will update once it is opened on Christmas Day - bought this for a Christmas present for my teenage son. Did not come in a shipping box but rather just the product box itself, covered in shipping labels. And on the front of the box where the product is pictured in large display. Very disappointed!

Got this keyboard for my custom build because it matches my theme (Hell Boy Theme) and wow I am truly impressed by this keyboard...Ive been using a old mouse and keyboard that ive had for years but now this is going to be my main keyboard..At first I was like WTH this mouse is so slow but you the hit the button below the mouse wheel and it changes the speed of the mouse and my god does it improve your shooting in FPS games..The rgb is nice and not distracting at all and love the letters on the keys even light up with the lights under it....Great Product for a Great Price

Great keyboard if you are just getting into PC gaming, The keyboard feels great and the keys are not too loud (well depends on how fast you type). The keys are interchangeable and it comes with a tool that helps you do that. The keyboard also comes with LED's  on the Dragon and the two red areas next to it, as well as the two on the bottom right and left. The Mouse is also a GREAT one. The mouse has an LED on basically on the red spots and comes with two buttons on the side that can be programmed, the buttons also have different feels so you do not have to look on which one your gonna press. The mouse also feels great and and has good ergonomics, mouse feels durable and tough and the right click/left click are also not slippery. This keyboard and mouse combo is great for people just getting into PC gaming.

It's decent. The colors running across keyboard are cool at first, but quickly become annoying. Doesn't seem as responsive as other keyboards, especially for a "gaming" keyboard. Good for the money though.

I really like the design of the mouse and keyboard, especially the LEDs on the mouse. I also bought the 12x10 inch mouse pad. It looks really cool with the mouse and keyboard. The button to change the DPI is very nice if I want to change it for another game where I need a lower sensitivity, but I like to have a high one on another game. The side buttons are nice, as I have never had buttons on the side of my mouse. They are very nice to go backward or forward on a webpage. The only problems I have is that the enter key is in a weird position. It haven't really used the keyboard much, as I am using a laptop right now, but I will use it in the future when I get my desktop all set up.The main problem I have is that sometimes when I push down the left mouse button, it squeaks. I have something I might be able to spray in it without it breaking the mouse, but I am too scared to lift up the mouse button, in fear of breaking it. I really like the mouse, but it squeaks too often and I can hear it through my headset. It really bothers me. Would rate 5 stars if it didn't squeak.

Bought this combo for my wife and her new PC build.  It does not get any better than this for the price.  I hope this company succeeds because they build quality products.  Yes it is made in China and that can sway many people.  However, this combo (along with their other products) are top notch for the price tag.  We bought the Archelon mouse pad as well for her and I am jealous of it. I would trade my hard Razer Destructor in a heart beat.  I also have the RedDragon Mammoth mouse from a Christmas gift.  Awesome mouse and the first time we were introduced to this company.  So far so good.

I have a gaming laptop and having an external keyboard has never crossed my mind, but wanted to give it a chance and stumbled upon this keyboard. After using it for the first few days, I never went back to typing on my integrated keyboard on my laptop, the tactile feel of this keyboard and the RGB effects are far superior than a built in keyboard. Would definitely recommend getting this keyboard whether it is for typists, gamers, or anyone, a phenomenal product.

This was a gift for my 12 yr old son who games a lot and uses it for school work. Keys are soft to the touch but same layout as a basic keyboard. The black color makes it not as bright but still lights up all over.

This keyboard is a great keyboard for gaming. It has durable keys and so far it has been holding up. It was a great price and it even came with a mouse that also does well for my gaming. I play on it for hours at a time and never run into a problem. For this price there isn’t a keyboard that compares

works well, mouse is amazing, easy to swap speeds.  Keys can get worn after long repeated use, such as the WASD pad, space bar got stuck, took it off, it has room to move left and right, and when either full left or full right it will catch the plastic nub underneath, just move it back to middle and try not to pound it too much next time.

A great addition for your desk top. The lights do turn off then you shut down or turn them off manually. Mouse is almost too fast, had to adjust the pointer speed to get "better" accuracy when playing SNIPER FURY.Worth the money for sure, would recommend.

What else can I say about this that others haven't already said? The keyboard is nice and responsive, great for gaming, the mouse is durable and easy to click, and it looks amazing. The build quality is absolutely incredible and I would absolutely recommend this to any budget gamer. At first glance, this doesn't look like something so inexpensive, but, lo and behold, it is, and it's great, and I love it. I've had absolutely no troubles with the equipment whatsoever and it all arrived on time and undamaged.

Sadly, if you're a fps gamer I would avoid this keyboard.  It lacks the basic ability to take more than 2/3 inputs at a time, so shift key running crounching and pushing one more button is a no go.  As a basic keyboard for typing and etc it works fine. For slow paced games, it should be good too, but for high paced FPS games, it sadly falls short of its necessary function.

I have used this keyboard for work and gaming over the last year without issue. The color is true to internet depiction and can be cycled through different settings - strobe, a slow fade, or one consistent color.The mouse also works fantastically. It has a button which allows you to quickly switch between 4 different DPI settings. The color on the mouse also isn't too bright or annoying.

For the price, its not a terrible keyboard. The only real gripe that I have is that some of the keys, especially the back space key, wanted to feel like it was binding unless you pressed it down exactly vertical. We ended up setting this keyboard aside and got a mechanical keyboard. If you're on a budget, this will do just "ok" for gaming, but not great at all for typing.Overall, the keyboard doesn't feel like cheap budget keyboard and the lighting is nice.

This is an amazing deal for the price. This is the best mouse and keyboard combo for the price. The keyboard looks and functions perfectly. The mouse is great, it has adjustable weights so it's comfortable for everyone. It also has adjustable dpi settings which I tend to keep on the middle setting because the higher one is really, really sensative. The only complaint I have is that when you press on the space bat there's a sort of springy sound but that's a minor issue. Perfect for a black and red setup.

I have three of these...one at work, one at home, and one I bought for my wife's work. They are outstanding and I love the feel of the keys! I did have some issue with delay in typing on my very first one, but their customer service worked the issue out quickly and sent out a new one that's worked fine since. Very happy!

We've all heard the horror stories of Redragon. Yes I know!! However, to be 100% honest this is the best Keyboard and mouse I've used yet!!! I've used Corsair, Razor and a few others but have found that overall workstation, gaming and long typing sessions this Keyboard and mouse combo are amazing!! I love them and have bought 3 sets!! Not trying to endorse this company but I am beyond pleased. I have one, my wife has one and I even bought one for my very skeptical friend who has yet to admit he likes them but they're still on his desk!!!
The features are incredible on this keyboard. Easy use in the dark.Upped my online gaming experience so much and the construction as well as the resilience is absolutely amazing.

Amazing product for the price. Quality is high, does not feel or look cheap, the rbg lights look awesome, the mouse feels great the usb wires are great quality, can't go wrong with this price. The only problem I have is the mouse not being rbg and only lighting up red so it may look off when you have your keyboard set to a different color. Other than that it is great!

Este teclado es para mi hijo de 14 años. A él le encantó por cómo se ilumina. Lo usa en el play 4 para jugar y también lo usa para chatear y la verdad es que el cuarto se ve genial con las luces del teclado. Era justo lo que él quería !!!
Got this to update an old computer set up for my grandson. This light show is pretty amazing and the quality is the same. Very happy with purchase!

This is my first gaming keyboard so I don't have a ton of gaming on keyboard background to compare it to.  It has done the job for me well though and the RGB components change and work flawlessly.  I have this plugged in through a USB 4 way splitter and it works with great response time.  It's less loud than my laptop keyboard but is not a quiet keyboard.  I'm upgrading my streaming equipment with a new microphone, but you can currently pick up every keystroke on my current mic.

I love this key board. The mouse needs to be bigger though, but the mouse is still easy to use. Been wanting a RedDragon for a long time. Their reviews is what sold for me. So happy with this keyboard.
pretty good keyboard, lights could be brighter and the way its use could be more clear cut but isn't a big deal

This keyboard was very solid and works really nice. It’s quiet and allows you to play and stream without hearing it. However, if you stream and play several hours everyday the keyboard does not have long life. You are looking 6-8 months. I was disappointing because it is a nice keyboard.

My 16 year old son loves this. It is more than what he needs as a average gamer. He is not into it hot and heavy, but loves to get into egaming in spurts. He said it is worlds different than the other keyboard and mouse he had. Would definitely buy Redgragon again.

I've had this combo for 3 years now and it is still going strong. Extremely comfortable keyboard, not too bright with the lights, and a mouse that fits really well. I will only be buying Red Dragon from now on.

My son and the whole family loved this set. The led backlighting is really nice. We game and I'm a writer. The keyboard is really satisfying to type on and the matte black is really nice with the colorful LED's.The mouse works perfectly and feels nice even in my small hands. It's also nice not to have to worry about batteries since they are corded.

Short and simple, Keyboard was great and so was the mouse however the mouse for some reason and few months after purchase started freaking out and would do its own thing without the mouse even moving, not sure of the issue but I threw it away for recycling. I think it’s a decent buy for the price however.

Received keyboard, however, several of the keys did not function.  I simply did a "replace with same item" through Amazon and received a new keyboard the next day.  This one has worked like a charm.  No issues or complaints.

I didn't get what was pictured. The "LED" is not the keys, its just red leds around the board. There also are not buttons at the top, it's FN+function key. That said, not 100% disapointed either. Key board works great, mouse is exactly as advertised and I still couldn't beat the price. I would of rated higher if the Keys actually were LED back lit as advertised. Will add photos if someone asks.

Overall I love the keyboard and mouse.  The both work very well.  9-months later unfortunate the mouse scroll wheel is not working properly.  Hopefully upon contacting customer support I can get a replacement.Edit: Customer service was a dream to work with and I now have a fully functioning mouse again!

Ordered this for my son. First order, the mouse would not work.  In the Windows environment, I could not click on icons.  A reset would fix the problem however browsing, playing games etc would cause the problem to resurface.  Contacted Amazon and a replacement was sent.  The replacement device worked well and I have not expected any problems.  The LEDs work great and overall a "good" product for the price.  3 stars because the first was defective.
This keyboard is not just for gaming--I needed a lit keyboard so I  do not have to turn the light on everytime I need to see what to key. I love it, and the mouse is greatly lit up. good buy.

This is a very good combo the keyboard and mouse seem to work very well I have no problem with the the mouse or the keyboard but I do recommend to completely turn off your computer once you're done if you're trying to sleep during the computer is asleep the RGB will not be able to be turned off so please make sure the shutdown your PC completely if you do not want to be disturbed up during the night because of the RGB and the mouse has red flashes

This is a gift and I only plugged it in to make sure it worked.  It worked and with a few key combinations, I was able to change the color settings and patterns without using any drivers or programs.  I  only want to warn that the package was shipped in the original box with a full color photo of the product, right on the box.

I'm actually disappointed in this product. It worked great for maybe like a month or 2 and my W jey cap has been glitching out. Whenever I would play games sometimes the W key would not work. It's really frustrating. Also the space key has been making this annoying squeal sound. I never put the key board through any rough situations and took good care of it. And bow I cant return their defected thing. SHAME

I love everything about this setup. The mouse and keyboard quality surprised me a lot, I'm currently playing Subnautica and I'm able to fine-tune building placement with the mouse, it glows a gorgeous dark red, and I set the keyboard for a low cyan backlight at night. The keyboard makes satisfying clacks when I'm typing, and the colors and backlight features are really fun to cycle through. I set it to dark blood red when I play the Forest and it really improves the experience tenfold. Very highly recommend.

This is a great value if you're looking for a back lit keyboard and mouse.  We didn't have to install any software, just use the keystrokes to change the colors, flashing, solid, or constantly changing.

Overall the RGB on the keyboard pushed me to this product. The mouse however only shows red led and has no other options to match my setup.Both products work great - but the mouse click is loud. Wish it was at least on par with normal mice but this one was just loud compared to my last one.
YouTube videos on how to change colors. Very easy. Smooth typing. Love it.

Great gaming keyboard/mouse for cheap. Keyboard feels great and allows many buttons to be pressed at once. Never owned a gaming keyboard before and had no idea how well they work/feel. Mouse is extremely grippy, slippery, and precise. Red LEDs do not turn off but are not as annoying to fall asleep to as blue ones are. Have not had to throw dirty clothes over the keyboard/mouse in order to sleep as I had to previously. First set I ordered had a dead "1" key on the keyboard, but I returned it through Amazon (not through the manufacturer) and was immediately refunded, allowing me to purchase a new one. New set arrived in perfect condition and I'm quite satisfied.

Warning! There is a button on this keyboard that shuts your computer down! This is the stupidest thing I have ever encountered. If the button is accidentally pressed in the slightest, there is no canceling this! All your work is instantly lost! Everything not saved is gone. If you do decide to order this, take a blade a pop out this button.The mouse that came with this keyboard is junk. Keyboard has been fine so far besides this stupid button.

Great keyboard and mouse, really comfortable to use. Being able to change between multiple colors on the fly instead of having to use software is amazing, I'm constantly changing the color of the back light to match the games I play.Small downside is the keyboard is fairly larger than my previous, but that is also a positive thing since the keys are cramped together but are spaced out nicely.

I really like the mouse. It is just the right size for my hand and weighted for just the right feel. The keyboard is good. It has good feedback for touch typing and feels durable. I use both for work and gaming and have had both for about a year. I recently bought the same  combo for my Wife. She uses them only for gaming and loves them. she has had them about 3 weeks now.

Cons: It is a great product, but using the fn key on the far right and f2 or f3 to change the volume is a bit of a reach or requires 2 hands maybe take out the button to the right of the fn key, move the bottom row over and add one on the left aswell.Pros: Great budget gaming keyboard, the meshanicial feel is nice and not to loud.

Nice combo...A steal as a set!I finally got around to giving away my HP (which was the reason I was building this new system.)  It didn't have an expansion slot to add a video card.  The keys on this red dragon keyboard seem a little bit closer together than the HP keyboard, and there is more push distance than I'm used too, But aside from that, this combo is wonderful!  I SUPER LIKE the mouse and I'm sure once I get used to the new key spacing It should be just fine.  Not cheap at all for the super great price of 25.00  (the mouse alone is worth that)

I got this keyboard and mouse det to replace my super average keyboard and my failing gaming mouse. It is exactly what I wanted.The keyboard is very comfy to use and very responsive. The enter key being a different shape takes some getting used to and I still haven't found out how to turn the lights off, but the hey board is great. The mouse is really nice too. Very comfy to use and I like the mouse 4 and 5 buttons for your thumb. The dpi button never gets pressed by mistake which is good. The only downside to the mouse is sometimes while browsing the Internet I will hit mouse 4 and it is auto set to be a back button. Not really a big deal though.

If you turn your PC off or put it to sleep, the mouse and keyboard also go to sleep. They reset the settings you make after you wake the PC up. It would be cool if there was a way to keep these settings to save time.

The keyboard has multiple lighting setting and additional features not found on stock keyboards.  The mouse moves and scroll smoothly on multiple speed setting and is more accurate than your normal mouse.  All together, they are a great value and an awesome buy.

For $30 i really didn't expect to get a keyboard/mouse combo at this quality. The anti-ghosting of the keyboard feels solid. I own a Razer Chroma keyboard and I almost like this one better.... The mouse doesn't feel cheesy either, its solid and it has counterweights in the palm of the mouse which i've never seen before. If your contemplating on getting this setup, just buy it you will be impressed.

I did not read the part where it said red led only. I have a matching green led setup for my game room and there is no adjustment to change the color in the mouse. You can manipulate many combinations for the keyboard but your mouse will always be red and breathing. I know that's nitpicky but little things matter sometimes when gaming. Other than that, I saved quite a bit of money on this and i have no complaints on the keyboard. I am still satisfied.

Coming from a serious gamer who sits hours on end at the computer desk with a video game channel. I was excited to see when this arrived quickly as well as connecting it to my rig. All was going well in the beginning..after a month of use. It started to show some faults. While the mouse is still preforming well as the day it arrived, the keyboard is starting to stagger. Eventually. While playing games like ark when trying to run away from dinosaurs or anything else that uses single buttons like w to run. It starts to stutter resulting in a slow skipping character progression. While it won't affect casual gamer. It seriously has its affects when it comes to certain situations.
Great cheap light up keyboard. I wouldn’t recommend it as ergonomically awesome as it’s a standard layout. That’s not why I bought it. I wanted a cheap cool light up keyboard. Works well!

For the money, I’m very happy with this mouse and keyboard.  They perform as expected...almost.  I have zero complaints about the mouse.  But the keyboard isn’t perfect.  The surrounding plastic looks cheap, and my backspace key is slower to rebound than the rest of the keys.  It’s fully functional though, so i didn’t bother sending it back.  It just feels a little strange.  The rest of the keys have a good feel to them, and the lights are nice.So, overall it’s a good combo, but there’s some minor quality control issues.

What an excellent set of products. The keyboard itself is more than alone worth the price. The keyboard is smooth and precise, with perfect key weights for gaming as well as typing. No obnoxious type-writer sound however you can still notice if you preform a keystroke audibly. No annoying extra "macro" buttons that end up not working. Have not actually USED the mouse as I am currently using Reddragon Perdition (which is baddddass), however it looks extremely nice with an excellent click style and extra buttons. 5 star product for a 5 star price!

So, I've had this set for aprox. 6 months now. Before now, I've had no problems, but as of the last week or so the mouse wheel has been acting up. It feels as though the rubber has expanded or loosened from the internal part for the wheel, so I just spin it with no results. I have to press down hard for it to catch, to the point where I actually press the center mouse button. This is no big problem unless you, like me, play competitive games online, where that extra second of having to fix up the mouse wheel to, say, switch a weapon or equipment of some kind, can cost you your life or even team victory. I am sure that there is an easy fix to this, which I will likely try to find. If I can, I will return and give it the 5 stars it deserves.Edit: I have searched for help fixing it, but it doesn't look like there is any readily found.I am still having the problem, but it seems to be increasing more frequently. It is beginning to become almost unusable. If anyone has any information or can refer me to a video that could help, I would be Very grateful. I may still have some time left on my warrantee, so I'll look into it.

I’ve had this keyboard and mouse for one year now. The mouse works great. However, the keyboard is terrible. My D key and ; key both will randomly start spamming themselves on whatever I’m typing. It was very annoying however I dealt with it and just last night both the keys broke and stopped working altogether.

item Was shipped in the merchandise box which was ok, the keyboard is awesome and feels like it’s made of good material, buttons are a little stiff but that’s to be expected. The mouse feels ok, the dpi setting doesn’t save so you need to adjust it every time you unplug it and plug it in. Would’ve been a 5 star review but the 2 buttons on the side of the mouse don’t work, I noticed when I unboxed the product there was a small piece of black tape over one of the two buttons but overall I just wish that QC would’ve done a better job before sending me a faulty product
First thing: the mouse that comes with the keyboard is superb.The keyboard is visually appealing.  However, it has two MAJOR issues:

I like the keyboard so far since having it. The backlit leds are pretty good. I wish it had more options for colors. Also one of the lifter legs are missing. If that wasn't this would get a 5 star rating for a cheap combo.  The keys a mechanical/membrane hybrid not close to cherry mx but an ok attempt. They have firm feedback and are low on sound.

Didn't really need a gaming keyboard but wanted backlit and decent quality "keying". This definitely hit the mark! Backlit colors can be changed, keyboard is responsive and not clanky/loose feeling. Mouse has weights that can be added/removed to your liking. Recommended to a couple of friends already!

I LOVE this keyboard! I bought for work and not gaming. Much more comfortable than regular keyboard. Love the colorful lights and the mouse is comfy too! Very happy with my purchase. Not sure how easy installation was as the IT guy at work installed it.

If you’re like me and don’t care about mechanical switches and just want a comfortable and attractive mouse and keyboard this is a great option. The mouse is very responsive and accurate. Absolutely a steal for the price.

Considering this is a gaming keyboard the most important feature for me is that I can game effectively with it and it does not accomplish that need.  The keys are super rough to push on to where after a few hours of playing my fingers would legitimately start to get sore.  When playing shooters I like to shimmy back-and-forth between walls with the A and D keys but with this keyboard since it's so hard to push down on the buttons it is impossible.  Sometimes I would even die because when I intended to move out of the way the key was so hard to push down on that it wouldn't register because I didn't push it hard enough.  I don't need a keyboard that requires me to slam down on the key to get it to work.

cant believe how nice this mouse keyboard combo is and so cheap but great quality the key action is really good not mechanical but does have a better feel than most keyboards mouse is amazing i would so buy this again and suggest  it to my friends

This is worth the buy. I love the keyboard. I have been through many mice since i purchased this (mostly because i can't find the one i want) but i am still using this keyboard. Looks amazing! Smooth and it isn't loud. BUY IT!

I purchased this keyboard and mouse combo for my wife's home-workstation . She's not a gamer, so I didn't need to purchase anything super-fancy. But I thought she'd enjoy the back-lights and gaming mouse.The set is exactly what it claims to be, and is very reasonably priced. I'm happy; she's happy; end of story.

I've never really used any other keyboard and mouse combo but I'm pretty impressed with it, especially for the price. The lights are beautiful and easy to change, the only thing is that you can't change the mouse to match the keyboard. Response time feels fast and I've never had any issues thus far with keys not responding. It's not loud but it's also not quiet, just the perfect amount of satisfying typing noises. I would definitely recommend this to others, it's a decent keyboard for the price that you pay.

Bought this for my little brother and he absolutely loves it. He’s a gamer and is just starting to get his equipment together for his PC. I mean, this kid was raving about how many clicks per minute this keyboard and mouse is capable of. I thought the colors were awesome, the design of the keyboard is sleek and both of them are ergonomic.
I liked the appearance and the action of the keyboard.  However, some keys just stopped registering after only a few hours of gentle use.

This keyboard was the greatest budget keyboard I have ever received in my life. The keys click fantastically and it even has a armrest to put your hands on as you type. This keyboard doesn’t even need to be used for gaming. I use it as my personal computer at home. The mouse is also amazing for the value because not only does it have two extra mappable buttons on the side, but it also has a weight underneath it that you can always remove and adjust the weight of the mouse. For thirty dollars this is a must buy.

Best gaming combo!!!!!!! Everything works great feels great you can adjust to your liking on the mouse control you could change the RGB’s color The Keyboard feel small and it’s great for gaming. money well spent!!

It’s an average combo. The keyboard has led lights which constantly flicker and it can’t be turned off. It’s just too annoying.Other than that I think its a good buy for the price and the keys feel tactile. Definitely go for it if you are looking for a cheap combo of mice and keyboard.

this keyboard dident even last 6 months thats sad and i also had a mouse that just failed for no obvious reason and it only lasted 3 months worthless Chinese junk HEY AMAZON WE DONT WANT CHINESE GOODS HERE IN AMERICA! so off to china with you!

My husbands controller broke so we got this for COD works well but we are unsure if the game is having issues or the actual keyboard. when doing certain things like jumping or pulling a parachute sometimes pressing the button doesn't registerWill update when we figure it out!

Keyboard and mouse combo have been sufficient for gaming, my last mechanical keyboard died after 8mths so I wanted a keyboard that would last longer.  It was an adjustment going back to a regular keyboard.  This keyboard and mouse combo was a very good budget friendly option and has done the job very well.
Beautiful backlighting. Easy to use. Great for any level gamer, but especially beginners for this price range you can decide if you want to upgrade later.

RGB resets eery time i turn my machine on or wakes from sleep mode.. so i cant keep  a setting i LIKE because  yeah... so for me thats a deal breaker... i only wish i could return it.. instead. its back in its box and ive gone back to my old setup that actually works.......... not happy  for the price i paid.

Not good not terrible. Was looking to replace my cheap used keyboard and when i got this its just as bad as the one it replaced. The keys can be sticky and when playing games you can only push down so many keys and then some will not register. The mouse was more of a bonus for me, i just needed the keyboard, cant change color and pulses depending on DPI setting. Although its cheap its really not worth getting, get something better
After 4 months use, some keys stick or do not work.  Was a nice purchase until this happened.
I love this keyboard and mouse! I did have to adjust the mouse in my settings when O got it because it was way to alow but that was an easy fix. No compaints here. Would buy it again.
Junkiest keyboard and Mouse ever! The mouse came broken out of the box. Its all cheap plastic crap. DO NOT BUY this I dont know how anyone has given this even a descent review

mouse is awesome, keyboard is comfortable but as a gamer, who uses his keyboard a lot, after a couple of weeks, the markings are starting to fade on the most used keysUpdating my review, as this keyboard still works amazingly well, and their customer service is top notch. They have been in contact with me since my review was posted, wanting to completely replace a fully functional keyboard, due to some fading, which are from the simply amount of time I spend at the keyboard.  I thank Reddragon for being awesome, and making quality affordable products!  I will buy from them in the future.

no outstanding issues.the coating on the mouse 1 and 2 is rough and kinda odd, and the fact that every time you reset your pc you have to change the flashing colors of the keyboard is annoying. I couldn't find the exact driver for the board as i did for the mouse.
Just flat-out stopped working

Well- I don't have a lot of lights on while playing so I decided to buy this. Several light modes and I really love it. Just plug in and you are ready to go. And the included mouse comes also very handy, of course also with light effects.
Only problem is it doesn't remember the light setting. So you have to set the color and pattern everytime. Other than that it's great.  Worth it.  Mouse is just a cool bonus.

The keyboard is not bad at all for the price. Keys aren’t too firm or loose. RGBs are nice and bright but can also be adjusted. Used the keyboard for a couple weeks now and no problems have occurred. Would definitely suggest this board if you are looking for a budget option. Mouse is a little small for my hands but still works perfectly fine.

I loved this keyboard and mouse set when I first got it--the lights are fun and both he keyboard and mouse have a good feel.  But only a week or so after purchasing, a few of the keys have stopped working, namely the "t" key (I'm having to paste the letter just to type this omg) and the caps lock key.  Really disappoined.

I have been using this for a while now. I have no problems while gaming. But I would still prefer to type documents on my laptop keyboard while only gaming on this keyboard. The feel is very good and has low noise so as not to disturb others. At first, I did not think I would use the shortcut buttons on the keyboard, but the calculator shortcut was used very frequently.

Probably the worst brand you could use for gaming. The price was reasonable so I decided to get it and that’s what u get. Despite it being a gaming keyboard it doesn’t let you press more than three or four buttons on keyboard, but only certain buttons, I have no idea why but for some buttons it inputs correctly when simultaneously pressed but for some buttons it doesn’t work. The mouse is also quite cheap quality, the sensitivity is inconsistent and works sometimes and doesn’t work sometimes.
Great keyboard.  Only thing  it wasnt accessible for my sons Nintendo switch. This is the only reason we returned. Great colors.
Have only used the keyboard for a couple months. One of the clips on the backside that tilt the keyboard broke off.  I wasn’t aware when it happened so now I have a tilted keyboard.

This is exactly what I expected and the multiple colors on the keyboard are just cool. Had to buy a second keyboard as i am using my regular one for my work computer and needed one from my regular computer. This price is awesome for what it includes. The mouse is very responsive and sturdy, like it way better than the generic ones that come with standard computers. Definite Recommend.
Very good keyboard and mouse set for the price. The keys are easy to press and does not make the annoying clunky sounds some other keyboards make when you type too fast.

I love this keyboard and mouse. The keyboard has many color settings, but I just have it set on red. It's not a fancy mechanical keyboard or anything, but I still like the feel of it.The mouse is good because it has those two extra buttons on the side. You can bind them to certain functions in games, and you can go back/forward through pages in chrome instead of clicking on the arrows on the top left. Very helpful in my opinion.

Very comfortable keyboard and mouse. The instruction manual explains how to change the keyboard colors, alternating breathing, solid color etc... Wish the mouse did the same, but i'm okay with that. My kids love my keyboard. It somehow motivates them to do their school work by changing to their favorite color. I will probably need to get them their own.

This keyboard is exactly what I was looking for, great feel in the keys, the color choices are good for the back lighting, and the mouse has some cool features.  I would have given 5 stars but for one thing, mouse has a bad light in it (went out in 1st 24hrs of hooking up), but it works fine so not that big of a deal to me.

Nice keyboard and mouse. I was looking for a replacement for the one that came with my Lenovo so it is close but not quite the same. Gotta get use to any new keyboard and so far the only thing that I have a hard time with is not be able to control the volume from my mouse. I haven't really looked at settings so maybe this is something I can do and just haven't realized it

love the keyboard, reminds me the keyboard of the 90's and the mouse is fast. takes a while to get used to .  Redragon has lot of keyboards.  This was the right size for my desk. works great with laptop.

Good quality in my opinion, not like a razer keyboard kinda good, but definitely worth the price, good as a beginner gaming keyboard and for light gaming, mouse has a weight in it giving it a comfortable weight, keys feel smooth and nice to the touch and click. I recommend for anyone building a first pc build or as a gift to anyone doing so, no drivers needed so just plug and play ♡

I work as a CAD draftsman, bought this to replace the keyboard and mouse at my desk.  Should get another set for my house.  Would like if the back end stood a little higher.  Had to go to website to get drivers for the mouse software.

Very noisy keyboard, its only good for gaming not for typing.. hope this keyboard will last for gaming... rgb lights is also the one attracts the eyes other than that its ok.. I am using 2nd keyboard for my typing...

My brother has been using this keyboard for two years and he loves it. He said it's excellent for gaming. The buttons haven't even started to wear yet. The mouse has multiple settings for gaming including mouse cursor speed button. Mouse has 2 buttons on top 2 on the side speed control switch the scroll roller switch is also a button.

This a good keyboard for the price.  It took some tinkering with the RGB settings to figure out how they work as there were no clear instructions for setting these.  But the keyboard works as it should and is responsive.  The mouse is a fine. Would be nice if you could cycle the RGB to match the keyboard, but obviously that has no impact on the function of the mouse.

"Cool, it lights up and it's programmable for gaming with hot keys" my 12 year old who easily figured out how to program it after reading the little directions. Plus the mouse it comes with works better than the other gaming mouse he had which did similar things. He said this one is much better, "does more"

Good starter gaming and keyboard, mouse is a bit sticky on delivery though, not sure if it was glue etc, but my client enjoyed these and still uses them.Both the mouse and keyboard has good response rate and the mouse dpi is good for gaming.
I love this keyboard . Very light and good rgb function, that you can change from the keyboard. The only thing is the mouse won't match the rgb.. or I haven't figured it out.

I'm not sure that I love it yet. I just hooked it up and the keyboard is a little stiffer than I am used to but I can see the advantage for when you are gaming. Worked great with both the XP system and the Windows 10. Running it through a KVM switch and no issues. Thanks so much.
Keyboard is great left mouse button will occasionally bind. It does work when it binds so it doesn't interfere with game play just annoying. Can't beat the combo for the price.

The mouse is great for its price and feels good. The keyboard is okay but still a great price.  There is only one light setting for the mouse which is “breathing” red.  The keyboard has about a dozen light settings but not for brightness and it’s hard to see the lights if you are in a light room.  I give the mouse 5 stars and the keyboard 4

For anyone getting for the xim apex it does work just be sure follow the tutorial, there’s good tutorial on YouTube how to setup . But ppl and even the apex says not compatible with it but it’s working on mine and still working.. ppl say mouse keyboard not overpower to console controller is just lying. First day of using on cod probably added 30 kills more than I usually get it very accurate precise aim ..
Came with 3 Keys that don't work. Tried to return the item, DHL refused to pick it. Amazon refused to refund me.This is will be my last purchase from Amazon too. Not a happy customer.

The mouse is okay for general use and gaming.  The keyboard is terrible.  The space bar is hard to push, doesn't rebound very fast, feels like it wants to stick down at time.  Absolutely terrible to type on.  The cheapest keyboard at Walmart is better than this one.

Works as described so far after 1 day, wishing there was more customization to the mouse, mouse light is 1 color- Red. Description says something about counter weights, I do not see any nor how to use any. No instructions, simple Google search pointed me to red dragon site, where you can download a pamphlet/manual.

My son finally got to use this keyboard with his new computer and it stopped working completely after 2 weeks of use. The style of it is pretty cool but apparently it has zero durability!!! I highly recommend not buying it!!

I was just looking for a wired mouse and keyboard combo to replace a wireless combo that never works right. I've been extremely happy with this purchase. You can hold down the 'function' (FN) button and press insert, home, page up/down, delete, and end to change the LED pattern and color, or turn off the LED's.

Good product, well currently, only the keyboard is in use. The mouse didn’t come with the weights so it feels like you’re pushing around air... perhaps what I get for saving a few bucks with purchasing a like new item.
Not good quality. We let our son used it for a while but he was never pleased with it.Is more on the cheap side. We ended up upgrading to a better one.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He needs a new keyboard and wanted one similar to mine that lit up. He's been using it since January, so only 3 months, and the keyboard lights shut off and we cannot get them back on. we've researched various ways to try to get them back on, but so far we cannot get them to come back on. So it still works, but the fun of having the lights is now gone and that bothers me.
Love them! Silent and material honestly feels pretty good for the price. Not to much experience on keyboards for gaming but you can’t deny how good of a deal that it is.

The only thing I can think is wrong with this product is the spacing of the spacebar from the other keys but it isn't must of an issue! Honestly, I was a bit scared buying this product. It seemed cheap and that I wasn't going to get a quality that justified the price but getting to see and use it myself, I can say it was worth more than being sold! I absolutely love it and one of the best things I have bought off of Amazon! You can change the brightness and speed of the light easily and the brightness is really nice. I wouldn't want any other keyboard.
i adore this set. took a day or so to get used to the fact that the colors move ALL THE TIME across the keyboard but once you get used to that its cool. mouse is super comfortable in your hand

Arrived on time, Plugged it in and it works right away. You will need to download software to play with the RGB lighting. The only complaint I have is that there is no software specifically for this model number. I had to do quite a bit of research and hit and miss software install to control the RGB in both keyboard and mouse. I found Centrophorus from Redragon is what I used for the Mouse. Summary. Keyboard and Mouse work perfectly, No problems tracking, typing and DPI are very good.

Awesome keyboard and mouse! The sensitivity of the mouse is amazing and the keyboard is awesome. The light on both the keyboard and mouse are really cool, and the controls for the lights are simple. This is an incredible package with the keyboard and matching mouse for an incredible price!

I bought a Redragon mouse years ago and loved it. When it became time to upgrade my keyboard and mouse, I looked to Redragon again. I found this set and decided it would fit my needs. I absolutely love it! It has a great feel and responds fast when gaming. The light options are very easy to use and have a huge variety. Being able to adjust the mouse speed is a nice touch. I would definitely recommend it!
My son got this for his PS4.  Worked without any hassle and he loves showing off the light show to his friends.

can't complain much with this price, but there are some problems. the space key is super loud when pressing it, sounds like the springs inside are broken. the keyboard disconnect for one split second once one or two hours. this result a really annoying reconnect notification voice when gaming or watching videos, so I turned off the notification voice. Some times the button cannot bounce back when gaming. If the D button can't bounce back, I will just keep moving rightward and die in game.

At first I was worried about ordering this keyboard and mouse bundle, because I have never heard of Redragon.  I gave it a chance.  Am I glad that I did give a chance to this great bundle.  Hooked up the keyboard and mouse up to my Alienware Alpha and I was ready to play games such as Counter Strike, Battlefield, and Call of Duty.  Keyboard and mouse are both really responsive, and have a smooth clicking once the buttons are pressed.  In all I am pleased that I choose this bundle.

For the price, this keyboard and mouse combo can not be beat. Great for casual gaming or typing. The keys feel nice and the mouse fits perfectly in big or small hands. Everything looks cool, the RGB lights work very well. And they are fully customizable to your fsvorite color, colorswitching, or multicolored settings. They look awesome in the dark. If you arent looking for professional gaming equipment, and want something for more casual use that just looks great, this is the best product in the price range.

We bought the keyboard in September & today (April) it’s acting up the a is a q the m a , so on and so forth. I’ve uninstalled and reinstalled I’ve checked to make sure no buttons are stuck etc. we did love this keyboard.
"c" and "3" keys did not work right out of the box.  Redragon is garbage.
Decent budget setup, keyboard and mouse look and feel fine.Two main issues:

I thought it was my system but I tried it on a different computer. It still gives me the same problem! BOUGHT THIS EARLY THIS JANUARY, been experiencing it from then, ignored it because I knew my PC was old. BUT THIS TIME, ON A DIFFERENT COMPUTER, SOMETIMES IT STILL GIVES IT A BLUE SCREEN WHEN A PROGRAMMED KEY is PRESSED!!!!I would give the mouse a 5 star because it was programmable and very convenient. 0 STAR FOR THE BLUE SCREEN IT GIVES ME.
The mouse worked, but the Keyboard was DEAD ON ARRIVAL. Tried different USB ports, my old Corsair keyboard worked, but this new one wont even turn on. Returning for refund.

When i plugged this product in there didn't appear to be anything wrong, nobody would expect anything. However when i tried to play games or just use them mouse in general everything starts to lag and badly at that. Games are un-playable with that mouse as far as my product goes
Quiet keyboard and the colors are nice and bright. You can change them too. The mouse is good too, not the best gaming mouse but it is nice.
Looks fantastic all lit up. Love that it's full sized and has lower keys so it's comfortable to use. Also like that it has a numeric keypad.

Great keyboard and mouse set, especially for the price!!!Only thing I wish this keyboard had, is a sleep button shortcut like my previous one did. I don't know why I need 2 CPU Files buttons, search buttons, email buttons, and refresh buttons on the keyboard.

First of all, I'm not a gamer. I wanted this keyboard for myself because it's lighted and easy to see. My grand kids and I love the changing colors, and it's just plain fun to have ! Also, it's really cool looking....LOL

Probably the best keyboard under 50$. The design is nice and all the button have a nice feedback rebound feeling when typing. I feel like I can type a little bit faster because of it. I don’t use it for gaming but rather for my daily office desk job. overall this item met all my expectations.

I bought this so that i can play ps4 with mouse and keyboard. They both work with xim apex but the mouse is a little slow. 3500dpi. But if you max the sensitivity in the game option you will be ok. Let me know if this was helpful.

It's alright. The mouse is pretty good. Great deal for the price, and I can see the improvement in gameplay quickly. The keyboard, not so much. It lacks any kind of granular rgb control, and only has about a dozen LEDs for the whole board.All in all it's value for the money, but if you're doing any more than dipping your toes in PC gaming and rgb, spend a bit more money, and you'll be happier with your purchase.

For the price, this is a great gaming keyboard. I don't like how there's the "interchangeable wasd and arrow keys" that literally are just the same keys with the arrows swapped around on them. Seems pointless. I would have preferred maybe 2-3 bonus programmable keys instead of that function. Still, pretty decent. The cord is wrapped in some sort of nylon which prevents my stupid cat from eating it, so that's a plus. The mouse is similar -- functions great, has two bonus programmable keys on the left side (great for push-to-talk or emergency heals in WoW).
Wanted a cheap but functional wired keyboard and mouse. I have been using this almost daily and it is still holding up very well. Works well . Would buy again
Just a nice basic bare bones keyboard and mouse with some extra functions. I like that you can change the color of the keys. I also like that the keys are quiet and not mechanical.
Comfortable keyboard and mouse,  large responsive keys,  high quality, fun multi-color customizable back-lit keys, mouse is very responsive even without pad, excellent set up.
Didn't get it for gaming. got it so I could see the keys. How I can see the keys to type. Now I have to see if I can get my fingers to work again ;-{)>

As much as I appreciate the speedy delivery, I do not appreciate the fact that it was advertised that I had a brand new mouse and key board just sitting on my front porch for my whole neighborhood to see. I do recommend that the next time someone purchases this product that you put it inside a less conspicuous box.
My son loves this set he's always on it. Glad about the purchase

I was super excited to get this keyboard and mouse as I am starting to get into pc gaming however the moment I tried using the keyboard I realized something was up. The mouse itself works just fine and I haven’t had any problems, however the keyboard has several keys that just don’t work for some reason. I am extremely disappointed after hearing such good things about Red Dragon products but I don’t think I’ll buy from them again.

Excellent keyboard, much better and cheaper than the backlit keyboard I bought in October 2016 that was lost by movers. --  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01I1N6J34/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o09_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1And it comes with a snazzy mouse.

I am in no way a professional gamer, however I enjoy playing Apex, ESO, Paladins and so on.  This has been working wonderfully for these games and for other online things as well. I have yet to put any weight into my mouse, but I intend to. Would recommend for the price.

I've been using this keyboard/mouse for a few weeks now, and I must say I am impressed. You truly can get a good setup for a low price. The keyboard alone is worth the price with the standalone keys and the RGB effects. The mouse deserves some love, too, though. It's awesome! I thought I would hate having a corded mouse, but it's totally doable. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.
Excellent keyboard and mouseWell built and worth the price

I've been using the keyboard for a full day know. I like the ability to change the colors and stop the breathing mode with the RGB backlighting. Keyboard feels a little mushy, but still good response. I am using an iMac 2015, and currenlty running windows 10 on the computer also. I wanted a keyboard to work with the pc side of my iMac. The apple keyboard wouldn't function as well as I wanted. This keyboard works perfectly with the iMac and Pc side of my computer. It's perfect for what I wanted.

I have used this keyboard for over a year.  An immediate review is not prudent, IMO...This keyboard is used extensively, for me for gaming, for the wife school.  It works as well today as it did the day I got it.
It's a good looking keyboard and mouse with customizable lighting. They are comfortable to use. I use the same mouse at work for autocad/solidworks.
I am not a gamer but I have two gamer romates so I bought this off their approval.Keys make enough noise to be satisfying but not too much that it is louder than my thoughts.\

Really love the features on this! It was a present for my boyfriend to replace his old hand-me-down, barely working keyboard and man this keyboard and mouse are amazing. He loves it a lot, and uses it all the time. I never know what color the keyboard is gonna be when I see it next! If you follow the instructions in the provided manual, it’s really easy to figure out the lighting functions. This product is fantastic!
Good keyboard and mouse setup I just wish I would have read a little bit more in the details saying the mouse doesn't change colors but over all satisfied with this product.

You'll be hard pressed to find a comparable set at this price point that is of the same quality. I used it in my home office, as from time to time I do like to play games etc. Also, helps set a nice mood in the room when I'm working for hours at a time.

I was looking for a keyboard for my son’s computer that had lights to go with his lighted motherboard and AMD RyZen 7 2700 and RGB Memory.  Lots of lights for his birthday.  In addition, he doesn’t have to worry about batteries.  So it looks cool even if the lights don’t enhance his gaming abilities.

Some of the reviews are bad. I never had a $100+ mouse so this was a huge upgrade from a generic mouse and keyboard. The mouse feels very well built and it tracks perfectly. Great for people who are upgrading from generic items.

Bought as a gift for my stepdad, so far he enjoys it and likes it. I haven’t heard any specific complaints, but I have heard him mention a couple things he “wish it did” which is why I’m giving it 4 starts.

It is shipped in it's original box with photo on outside, so keep this in mind if it's a christmas gift or if you're wanting to be more helpful to anyone stealing packages. The gift surprise was ruined as soon as my kid saw it on front porch. Thanks shipping dept!

I do not use the mouse, so this review is only the keyboard.If it remembered your settings, it would be a five star product for the low price.  However, having to reset the lighting pattern and color after every reboot is very annoying.

I dont know if this is how the keyboard is made or if my keyboard came defective,  but the keyboard everytime u hit a key it doesnt get stuck but it takes time for the key to pop up again kinda like if you get gunk stuck between the keys and the overall experience is bad.  The mouse works like any other mouse no issues with that.
The mouse is trash, scroll wheel is unusable and is just an ew experience.As for the keyboard its a keyboard and it works nothing fancy to say about it.
Works fine. Only gripe is that adjustment to lights reset everytime you restart computer. No big deal.  Key travel fine. Not mechanical. Mouse is weighted and works great.
Great, but some reason it will go to safe mode while playing a game. I would say overall, it is a great product... after a while I figured out how to stop the safe mode problem.
Bought as a gaming keyboard for my sons first gaming computer we built.It is black with red lights and he named it RedDragon, so when I saw this I had to buy it.
within the one-month keyboard falling apart. strick keys felling out, and light stop working and seller noncooperative. I think i wasted my money now will buy another
My husband got this last week and he’s still bringing up at least once a day how great it is. I’m getting a little tired of hearing it.
I bought this on a budget almost 4 years ago. It is still working perfectly well. Good looking, very nice quality. Not a single  regret
half of the keyboard and m have a backlit line underneath the letter, the other half doesntwhat's the point of that? just to infuriate people?
That's my only issue.  The rest is great, and the keyboard even has those little flippy things in the back that raise it a little bit.
I love this kit, I am hoping that the LED's last me a long time, I love the different color modes. It is such a joy to type on, I am using it right now! Great product(s) for the price. Plug and play!

Honestly, I wasn't expecting a ton from this package, but the mouse wheel stopped working after 6 months. That seems like a really short amount of time considering my Anker mouse lasted for years before dying. Guess I will go back to a company that I have faith in.
The mouse is wonderful. A little small for my hand but moves very quickly and so smooth. Keyboard is very nice. Soft keys no noise. Lights are very nice. Wonderful

I only gave this 3 stars because it's not exactly what I expected. I thought the keyboard was LED in the keys so I could play in the dark. It is not, so that was my fault I suppose for not doing more research. The mouse is a good shape for the hand and it has 5 buttons and a center button that can adjust the speed of the mouse on the fly. Very handy for desktop and gaming. All and all I would say this is a great setup, just wish the LED was in all the keys.

This is a very high quality mouse and keyboard for the price. Fairly useful interchangeable wasd button for some game. The feedback on keypress is very nice and smooth especially in speed typing. If you are casual gamer like myself, and occasionally needs to go crazy in some games and doesn't feel like spending high bucks for those super high end mouse and keyboard, then THIS IS FOR YOU!!The only disappointment is the light stays on even after shutting off computer.
Nice keyboard. Not a real gaming keyboard, has soft touch keys. However it's perfect for my daughter. The mouse is great for regular or gaming use.

The mouse is great but the keyboard started to wear a bit sooner than I would have liked. The keys started to stick and not register all the time. For the price this is not bad, but if you have an extra $10 go for something a bit nicer. The biggest drawback is the lack of backlighting for the keys.

Pretty good for gaming and a very just pice it is not  the best keyboard and mouse but it is good for who just start on gaming things i played rainbow six siege fortnite and gta and it works pretty good

Really no complaints about it. I only wish that the keyboard would maintain its backlight settings after the desktop was powered down so you didn't have to reset it everytime the desktop is powered back on.
I love it it is great. the only thing I would change if I could is make the mouse cat proof. but that's just a suggestion. my cat likes to sit on it, and its a little sensitive when that happens.
Great deal and love the material. Light was bright and keys are well placed, just that space bar made low pitch noise so that I needed to return it but good stuff.
The keys get stuck. It doesn't have good feedback. I like the different color effects but when it comes to gaming. The keys get stuck and then its hard to push down on.
Nice features on the keyboard. Mouse is better then expected, small size for my small hands, taking weights out actually makes a difference. Would have like a top button for dbl click
Bien

Was pleasantly surprised by both the quality and cost of this product. I personally was already set on getting a mechanical keyboard so i got this solely for the mouse with the added bonus of having an extra gaming keyboard around. I am so happy with the feel, responsiveness, and look of both the keyboard and mouse that i may not even keep the mechanical unless it makes a very noticeable difference in my gaming or typing ability. The Mouse has to be one of the most comfortable mice I've ever felt, the grip is perfect for my hand and it has holes in the sides so your hands don't get sweaty from rubbing or pressing against it for long periods of time. The middle mouse button also scrolls and WORKS WELL AS A BUTTON. Not normally a big deal but for the first time in my life i actually use the mouse button for things because it is so easy to press down on without accidentally scrolling, it has the feel of both a button and a wheel which is great for games like Path of Exile. honestly for 28 bucks this is practically a steal. I would have payed that much for a much crappier mouse at office depot, and here i got an amazingly comfortable and responsive mouse AND a decent keyboard as well.

I can't complain about this set at all. It was exactly what I was looking for, I wanted a membrane keyboard to take with me travelling, because I may be bunked up with people, I didn't want something too loud. The mouse is a decent optical mouse, the lowest setting 1000 dpi is almost too high, I wish it started at 500dpi and went up from there, but I can just use it at 1k and turn my sensitivity down.

A total steal for the price. It looks cool and even works better than my old logitech set (less input lag). The keyboard just feels good to type on, and the clicking sounds that come from it are fantastic. Not too loud, and not mechanical, but it just feels almost therapeutic to click. My only gripe is that there's no way(as far as I can tell) to turn off the red LEDs without completely unplugging the board and mouse from the system, even when it's shut down. I've resorted to just hitting the off switch on my power supply so the lights wont be on 24/7. Other than that, it's a great set that's further improved by the seductive price.

Yeah product is ok, quiet keyboard, nice mouse, but there is no driver software included in the packaging. and Red Dragons website offers no solution for lack of drivers even though it specifically states software is included for programming the keyboard.Keyboard and Mouse are good.
Very very impressed with this duo. Absolutely gorgeous and responsive. The rgb on the keyboard is great and the mouse is also amazing!

Attractive, good working keyboard. Mouse is a little tricky. The booklet that came with the set directs you to the support website to download manual and drivers. Only to find they don't support the S101-3 model. Emailed thecompany, sofar no response.

I would play for long periods of times using my apple keyboard and apple magic mouse. Until  I finally decided it was time for a change the only problem was that i was on a strict budget. So I couldn't afford a nice gaming keyboard and mouse this combo is the jackpot for anyone on a budget or anyone who is just a casual gamer like myself. The keyboard doesn't feel cheap at all it feels great when typing and gaming I love the design of it and the mouse just has a very good response both the keyboard and mouse light up in the right places  if you're a computer gamer on a budget I highly recommend this combo for you.Pros : Price is great

The keys are very nice to press the mouse is very smooth and ergonomic my only complaint is it a back line on the keyboard could be a little bit brighter. I do like that you can dim it but I wish I can go a little bit brighter.

I just received my Redragon Keyboard/mouse set. The keyboard is awesome and has wonderful color changing settings. However, the mouse itself is not programable as stated in the description and It feels like the mouse is sluggish. I know you can change the "DPI' by pressing the arrow key next to the scroller but nothing has changed. Maybe my mouse is broken??

I wanted to let the customers know that I had a bad experience with this particular product. The key is broke. The shift key stays in down position all the time. The mouse broke as well. All of this happened within six months. In the first six months it was working fine it's just does not last long. It's made out of cheap plastic material. I reached out to the company with a comment but they have not replied back yet.

Although rather pretty the product I received came out of the box, broken.The mouse's back button on did not move at all. The real kicker was that the left click button wouldn't open any program on my task bar or even the Start menu or the desktop short cut tools. If I right clicked, the screen menu would open and I could left click on that but then it would dot work in any way after that. I restarted my computer and the left button worked for one day then stopped working and no amounts of restarting or pulling the USB out and putting it in another USB port could get it to work.
I am happy with this I like that you can have it rainbow or change it to a single color I do wish they would have had a cordless mouse option too
Great product

I tested this out when I first received it - it was working fine.  I put it in the box for a couple months while I re-did my office and built a new gaming rig.  Now, several keys are not working unless you press them really hard.Does anybody know how to contact redragon support?

It works good but the ENTER button is weird and you have to reach far to get there, something to get used to. The braided fiber cable was nice at first,  but once it got all twisted the cable looks horrible now (we move this keyboard around a lot during game play).  The keys are not back lit. If you're looking for back-lit keyboard, this is not for you.
The keyboard and mouse are both great just if you only have 2 USB ports on you console you cant charge your controller.

Original Review: 2 Stars.The keyboard and mouse look great and they perform pretty well, except for one significant problem: The left button on the mouse squeaks! At first I thought it may have been some initial friction on the plastic which would go away after a few hours of use, but here we are 3 days later and the noise does not appear to be going away (see attached video). I am going to attempt to exchange my mouse and keyboard for a new set in the hopes that I may get a new one that does not have this same issue. If and when I get a replacement I may revisit this review... but for the time being, this mouse in unusable in its current state.

At first everything seemed fine, but the tab key occasionally sticks causing the screen to flip out. Additionally, when connected, the keyboard and mouse set will stop my wifi from working. The second I plug them in, it drops, and the second I disconnect them, the wifi picks up again immediately.EDIT:

My son has been bugging me for a keyboard and mouse to use with his PS4. Gamestop told us that PS4's were not compatible but my son called the mans bluff. He found this keyboard and mouse, so I of course ordered and he is having a blast learning how to play his video games all over again. He said it is more challenging but he loves challenges. Great product for a great price!
Uncomfortable to use, feels cheap, labels on buttons look scrubbed off, volume button is difficult to use.  Overall a terrible keyboard.
Excellent! Have had for about 6 months and still works as great as it did the first day we bought it. Great long lasting quality.

The person who packaged my combo keyboard, didn't put it in a AMAZON box to protect the original package. The box got damaged along the way and it was only taped by labels. I much rather would like it if it was packaged in a decent Amazon box than sending it alone.
Been playing season 16, Diablo 3 for hours just after receiving my new keyboard & mouse! All positive so far! The keyboard dances with color, it is amazing! Mouse is smooth and reactive.

Can't get a better combo for the price. The keyboard is nothing special, but it looks very nice. No ghosting issues, and red gaming keys are a nice touch. The mouse, however, is absolutely perfect for this price. It has a great feel, nice switches, and a couple of programmable buttons. I don't ever use over 2000 dpi anyway, so this mouse is definitely worth the buy. The lights can't be turned off, but they're not bright enough to be annoying. No regret's on this purchase.
I love the way the keys feel and their sound, love the RGB, love the overall layout. It is really comfortable to use and great for gaming.

I have used this for the last 3 days since it arrived.  It has been more than expected since I used a smaller keyboard for gaming.  Overall great product and being able to change the colors of the keyboard.

I love the feel of this keyboard, the mouse is excellent and really one of my best I've used. I have bought more expensive ones but the feel is very natural. The keyboard has some cool features but keep in mind the keyboard is not mechanical and is not backlit. There are some led lights but I don't need them as I know where the buttons are. ( I play in the dark ) You can't beat the look either. I paired it with my case, matching headphones and mouse pad.

This is a really well built keyboard and mouse combo at a really good price! The keyboard feels really nice to type on and that is one of the major things that I look for because I type a lot. The only complaint that I have, the reason why it is 4 stars and not 5, is that I feel that the enter key is oddly shaped compared to other keyboards. I keep hitting the slash button instead of enter because all of the keyboards that I am used to has the enter key going in towards the median more than this keyboard. Other than the enter key I have no other complaints on either the keyboard or the mouse. For the price this is an amazing combo!!!!

I've had this keyboard/ mouse combo for a few months now and can't be any happier.  They both work extremely well, very responsive every key works perfectly.  The RGB lighting added the perfect compliment to my newly built (and RGB tricked out) Ryzen 7 2700X gaming build.

This product is an amazing deal for just $29.99. The Combo is unlike any other companies that sell their products that are made from cheap material. This is an RGB keyboard with a sufficient amount of lighting effects. I like how the flowing rainbow effect from the Razer keyboards can be achieved on a cheap keyboard. There are also 25 Anti-Ghosting keys. The keyboard is not mechanical, but it is smooth and feels nice with a decent sound. However, the mouse is a different story. The mouse stutters sometimes while gaming, and the entire mouse is made of a plastic that is very rough and coarse. The mouse only has one color, red. The kind of upsetting thing is that the keyboard does not have a braided cord but the mouse does. This is a MEMBRANE keyboard NOT MECHANICAL. Do not buy this if you are looking for a mechanical keyboard because the switches do not look like cherry mx and are definitely membrane switches. The multimedia keys are not so useful, and can cause you to possibly shut down your computer because one of them symbolizes a power button. Also the Redragon logo on the keyboard does not glow and neither do the multimedia keys. Overall, this is a good feeling keyboard and I do recommend it.
Bought this for my son who is starting out gaming.  Great, affordable way for a person to decide what works and doesn't

Keyboard is pretty standard.  Got some nice feel to it and some cool options as far as lighting settings.  Mouse was no good.  Gave me erroneous clicks and scrolling.  For the price, I expected better.

Actually horrible keyboard ... mice is ok , can use a bit , but keyboard ... all buttons after 2-3 days start cracking and hardly pushing , just low quality item . 2/10 . Better add little more money and get something worth it .

My mate really like the keyboard and mouse. She plays a lot of games and the backlit for features make playing at night a benefit to me when I am trying to sleep. The mouse and keyboard are fast and responsive. The products appear to be made of good quality and look beautiful.
Not the most ergonomic for the wrists and I had to turn the blinking lights off on the keyboard. But it works great.
Son loves this! Wanted one specific for gaming. He loves the backlit Keyes and it can be changed to his liking.  No complaints so far!
had a dark area at my open concept officeThis keyboard took care of the issue

Bought this as a gift for my son and he loves it. It’s very bright and colorful so definitely learn how to turn the lights off, especially if your desk is in your bedroom. We have it connected to a Mac and haven’t had any issues with it. I use it for office work and I like how the keys respond when I’m typing. Very comfortable.

This keyboard is marketed as a good gaming keyboard, with the perks of a mechanical keyboard. It is not that. I really suggest you do not buy this. It feels very tactile for the first 3 weeks, but then becomes mushy, due to it being a membrane keyboard. I found myself experiencing ghost keys, as well as a small crack in the base plate from poor craftsmanship. Overall, this is a bad keyboard that I would not recommend.
no issues, worked good out of the box. would be nice if the mouse could sync with the keyboard but no big deal. played a few rounds of CSGO and everything is responsive. good deal.

I'll never admit this in public, but this $30 mouse/keyboard combo has put up with my abuse for well over two years now.  They still work great with no issues.  I want to hate this product, but I can't.  It's pretty solid.

So I knew what I was typing and a lot of colors and diff kinda ways you can preset it. the only thing bad about it is sometimes it resets to its Default rainbow and dim out and in but you just get used to it and makes you all spiffy and probably you end up changing it and EXPLORING NEW COLORS
The mouse and the keyboard work really well when playing my games and the keyboard is super-quiet when I am working and conferencing. No one can hear it. Good product.
Very dim compares to other gaming keyboards. Bought for son as he plays Minecraft and he said the keyboard and mouse (more specifically the keyboard) are not bright at all

Needed a simple keyboard with back lit keys for work. For the money, this is perfect. Only downside is wish it had more of an incline when propped up.Quiet keys, 4-5 color options and works as it should
Christmas- Many items, some are worth commenting on. This works well, good tactile, nice lights, good present.

This keyboard does work really well, it is smooth and the lighting is a fun feature. However, any key that has more than one character on it, like the 1 key, does not light up on the top half and is difficult to see. Some are worse than others. It doesn't keep me from typing since I don't look at most of the keys anyway yet if I knew this was going to be the case I would have purchased a different keyboard. The mouse works great too!

Getting both a keyboard and mouse for the price was a pretty good deal. Ive been using the mouse for about 3 weeks now.... Works great for gaming. Not as ergonomic as my last mouse but does the job.
